avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has melted but will freeze again this weekend. SW snowfall and strong winds are expected for the weekend that could form windslabs in N-A facing hills.

snowpackStructure.highlights: SW winds and snowfall has dominated last week but a lot of the snow was blown away. It got warm high in the mountains but it rained early on Friday so snow has melted and subsided widely. It will freeze again this weekend and the snowpack will get stronger. A snowpit was taken in Bláfjöll on the 30th of January in a NW facing aspect. There was dominantly driftsnow with thin layers of hail in between. Extented column tests showed a failure at high load (ECTN26 @80cm). Small windslabs could form in constant SW winds during the weekend.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowfall this week. Early on Friday a lot of snow melted and it rained but the frost returned quickly. A weak layer has been discovered where new colder snow has buried the warm wet snow. Snowfall will continue throughout Saturday in variable winds around the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs have accummulated in various faces this week. Freezing temperatures could cause development or weakness in the snowpack as wet snow was buried under cold dry snow.

weatherForecast.highlights: Viðvarandi SV snjókoma í miklum vind einkennir alla helgina en það lægir og frystir með Sunnudeginum.

avalancheActivity.comment: Avalanches fell on Súðavíkurhlíð on the evening of 30th of Jan and night of 1st of Feb. Many avalanches, most of them small, released in the area during and after heavy but short snowfall and snowdrift on early Thursday 25 January.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has melted up to around 600m height but will freeze again this weekend. SW snowfall and strong winds are expected for the weekend that could form windslabs in N-A facing hills.

snowpackStructure.highlights: During the last week, snow has added and drifted in variable wind, especially SW. Before, there was little snow in the area. A snowpit was taken on the 30th of Jan in Seljalandsdalur that showed layered windslabs with a hard thin layer between them on top of melt/freeze snow. Compression test gave straight fracture by medium stress in the new windslabs (CT13/15@56cm). Most likely it melted in the upper part of the snowpack on Friday before it froze again but deeper layers were likely not affected by the warmth. Snowfall and strong winds are expected to continue throughout Saturday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowfall this week. Early on Friday a lot of snow melted and it rained but the frost returned quickly. A weak layer has been discovered where new colder snow has buried the warm wet snow. Snowfall will continue throughout Saturday in variable winds around the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs have accummulated in various faces this week. Freezing temperatures could cause development or weakness in the snowpack as wet snow was buried under cold dry snow.

weatherForecast.highlights: SV hvassviðri og éljagangur á föstudag og aðfaranótt laugardags. Snýr í NA vind með lítilsháttar snjókomu á laugardag. Lægir og frystir á Sunnudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few avalanches occurred last week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Windslabs are on N-E aspects after strong SW winds. Snowfall on Friday but rain at lower elevations. Snowfall on Saturday during northeasterly winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Windslabs and cornices are present, especially on N-E aspects after SW winds. Weak layers could be present. It will snow the night before Friday but rain at lower elevations which could cause wet avalanches. Snowfall on Saturday during NE-winds and possible drifting snow, which could cause windslab formation on SW-aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowfall this week. Early on Friday a lot of snow melted and it rained but the frost returned quickly. A weak layer has been discovered where new colder snow has buried the warm wet snow. Snowfall will continue throughout Saturday in variable winds around the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs have accummulated in various faces this week. Freezing temperatures could cause development or weakness in the snowpack as wet snow was buried under cold dry snow.

weatherForecast.highlights: Aðfaranótt föstudags snjóar í fremur hægum vindi en kólnar og snýst fljótt í hvassa SV/V-átt með éljum og skafrenningi. Á laugardag snýst í  norðaustlæga átt með snjókomu og skafrenningi. Útlit fyrir hægari vind á sunnudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few small avalanches occurred in Norðfjörður last weekend. A small wet sluff occurred above Neskaupstaður last week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: It will snow the night before Friday, followed by a thaw. Chances of wet avalanches during the warm period. Windslabs in high elevations, especially on easterly aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It will snow the night before Friday in rather light winds but rain at lower elevations, followed by a thaw at high elevations. Chaces of wet avalanches during the warm period. Freezing again on Friday afternoon. Hard firn in lowerpart of mountains but windslabs at high elevations, especially on easterly aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs have widely formed after ongoing SW snowfall this week. Early on Friday a lot of snow melted and it rained but the frost returned quickly. A weak layer has been discovered where new colder snow has buried the warm wet snow. Snowfall will continue throughout Saturday in variable winds around the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs have accummulated in various faces this week. Freezing temperatures could cause development or weakness in the snowpack as wet snow was buried under cold dry snow.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lægð gengur yfir landið aðfaranótt föstudags með snjókomu til fjalla en rigningu á láglendi. Í kjölfarið hlánar hátt til fjalla um tíma en snýst svo í SV/V-átt og frystir. Úrkomulítið á laugardag og snýst í norðlægari átt með líkum á snjókomu á sunnudag.
